alert.note: Alert for Charlotte; DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 28 at 5:27PM EDT until June 28 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Charlotte County in southwestern Florida... Southwestern DeSoto County in south central Florida... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 527 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Punta Gorda, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Punta Gorda, Murdock, Solana, Charlotte County Airport, El Jobean, Port Charlotte, Harbour Heights, Charlotte Park, Cleveland and Charlotte Harbor. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
